modName: A home fit for an ArchMage
summary: Adds a second floor to the Arch-Mage\'s quarters
descriptionHtml:
This home features a workshop, a private garden and a treasury. located in the college of winterhold, above the arch-mage\'s quarters.

-Installation-
the fastest way to install this mod is to use the NMM. 
If you want to manually install this mod, download the file and place in your skyrim/data folder.
When you launch skyrim make sure Mage.esp is selected.

-Follower-
Once inside you might notice a little fella called MiniMe. Minime is a small but strong follower, i encourage you to give him a shot.
author: dekkel95
